ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Suckage
ygData.msgSnippet: Man, that bites! If I were a mod I would unsub you. Can you log into yahoo and modify your subscriptions? Yahoo is a pain in the asterisck. I think it sucks bc
ygData.messageBody:
Man, that bites!
If I were a mod I would unsub you. Can you log into yahoo and modify your
subscriptions?
Yahoo is a pain in the asterisck.
I think it sucks bc it's run completely on Compaqs.
luv,
-Su

> That sucks! Except I don't play eq and I couldn't care less<g>
>
> The yahoo web side thingie won't let me subscribe to Whispers of
> the palantir. I found the WhisperPalantir and clicked join group.
> Voila, a new subscription to EQ!
>
> I really, really dislike this fickle yahoo! Why isn't it bankrupt?!?
>
> Get me off please! With sugar on top!
>
>
> Andreas B.
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
